WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has reached 60 days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with reference to the currently affected versions and any necessary files.
WorkItem.Description: Unbalancing Strike is accurately listed in BuffCache, but is not selectable in the 'Temporary Buff' section of Rawr 2.2.5.

Comments.Message:
Most models do not support it. What model are you interested in supporting it?

(and out of curiousity, why? It perplexes me that we have that debuff at all, since there's no feasible way to gear around it, as far as I can tell; you just swap tanks...)

see, while you can't avoid (it can miss) being hit by the ability itself, you can stack block rating to push crits off the table and solo tank it. (so much block rating on ulduar gear it makes me sick...)
At least that's the reason why I made the paladin model support the debuff.
the bear model currently doesn't have unbalancing strike
